overview: This portrayal of small town life before the War is based on a small boys determination to get to see the circus, over all obstacles. Escaped lions, lightheaded blackmail of his father, and playfully planting stolen papers on his sisters boyfriend are all in a days work for little Henry Peck.
tagline: The Kid Himself Wonder Star of the Film Firmament Registers Laughs Unlimited
title: Peck's Bad Boy
